Class StudentGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • StudentGraph
  • public class StudentGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    A graph representing the UniversityStudent's relationship with other UniversityStudents and there are some methods to add/delete relationships, also there is a method to perform perform bfs for specific targets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StudentGraph​(java.util.List<UniversityStudent> students)
      Construct a StudentGraph from a list of university students.

    • Method Summary

      Performs a bfs starting from a given student to find a path to another student who has interned at the specified company.

      Retrieves a list of all students directly connected to the specified student.

      Checks whether a direct connection exists between two students.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StudentGraph

        public StudentGraph​(java.util.List<UniversityStudent> students)
        Construct a StudentGraph from a list of university students. Initialize an adjacency list for all students with no connections.
        Parameters:
        students - the list of students to be included in the graph

    • Method Detail

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection​(UniversityStudent student1,
                          UniversityStudent student2)
        Adds a connection between two students. If student 1 has a connection with student 2 then student 2 should also have a connection with student 1. The connections are undirected.
        Parameters:
        student1 - the first student
        student2 - the second student

      • removeConnection

        public void removeConnection​(UniversityStudent student1,
                             UniversityStudent student2)
        Removes a between two UniversityStudents.
        Parameters:
        student1 - the first student
        student2 - the second student

      • getConnections

        public java.util.List<UniversityStudent> getConnections​(UniversityStudent student)
        Retrieves a list of all students directly connected to the specified student.
        Parameters:
        student - the student whose connections are to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a list of students directly connected to the specified student

      • hasConnection

        public boolean hasConnection​(UniversityStudent student1,
                             UniversityStudent student2)
        Checks whether a direct connection exists between two students.
        Parameters:
        student1 - the first student
        student2 - the second student
        Returns:
        true if a connection exists, false otherwise

      • bfs

        public java.util.List<UniversityStudent> bfs​(UniversityStudent start,
                                             java.lang.String company)
        Performs a bfs starting from a given student to find a path to another student who has interned at the specified company.
        Parameters:
        start - the student from which to start the search
        company - the target company for finding a referral path
        Returns:
        a list of students representing the path from the start student to a student with the target company in their internships, or an empty list if no such path exists
